item.description:
Hi All,

My name is Meraj--I'm a 31yo who's new to the forum. I've been doing olympic tris this past year and am training for the Orlando 70.3 this May. Been in Boston 5 yrs and work over at MGH. Anyway, I thought I'd introduce myself now, because I was thinking about doing a last minute century ride for the LiveStrong foundation this weekend, and wanted to see if anyone else was interested in joining me.

Registration is on site and is only $30. It's this Sunday in Canton, CT (2 hrs from Boston outside of Hartford, CT).

More info at the website: http://www.RidingForA...

Let me know if you're interested ASAP. It would be nice to share rides if possible.

Sincerely,
Meraj
item.name: Livestrong Century Ride this Sunday
